channel.title: CVE Feed for Philips -- Brilliance CT Scanners
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Philips -- Brilliance CT Scanners

item.title: CVE-2018-8861|2024-09-17T03:59:05.842Z -- philips -- brilliance%20ct%20scanners
item.description: Vulnerabilities within the Philips Brilliance CT kiosk environment (Brilliance 64 version 2.6.2 and prior, Brilliance iCT versions 4.1.6 and prior, Brillance iCT SP versions 3.2.4 and prior, and Brilliance CT Big Bore 2.3.5 and prior) could enable a limited-access kiosk user or an unauthorized attacker to break-out from the containment of the kiosk environment, attain elevated privileges from the underlying Windows OS, and access unauthorized resources from the operating system.
